data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus Stenogephyra Lyneborg (Diptera: Therevidae: Phycinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Webb, Donald W., Hauser, Martin (2011): Revision of the genus Stenogephyra Lyneborg (Diptera: Therevidae: Phycinae). Zootaxa 2837: 67-85, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.201693
